      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.persistence.entity.PetMeta> getAll()
      Returns List with a list of stored interface PetMeta.
      PetMeta getOrCreateFromPlayerIdentifiers(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String uuid)
      Returns the petMeta of from the given player uniqueId. Creates a new one if it does not exist yet.
      PetMeta save(PetMeta petMeta)
      Saves the given petMeta instance and returns the same petMeta instance.
